fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / ADDITIONAL CONTENT
START
input
Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're *local law enforcement* are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're *local law enforcement* aren't you?" The lieutenant looks Titus in the eye. "Helping troubled civilians should fall under your jurisdiction."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, I think you're right, Gene."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, I think you're right, Gene." Titus gives him a beer salute and turns to you. "She have something of yours, pig?"

fields.Title: You: ""Law enforcement is a respectable o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Law enforcement is a respectable occupation, sir."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Was? Like before? Just an old lady..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was? Like before? Just an old lady. Her kids moved away years ago. Never come to visit, never took her calls. She gets... out every now and then." He swirls his beer. "She did right by lots of us when we were kids. Always was a little off, but still."

fields.Title: You: ""It fell into the water.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It fell into the water."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "The big man shrugs. "Whatever, cop...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The big man shrugs. "Whatever, cop. Don't worry about it. We'll take care of our own."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "The big man laughs, nearly spitting..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The big man laughs, nearly spitting out his beer. "What's that, copper? You want us to help little old ladies now?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yup. Her.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yup. Her."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Boy howdy." He sips his beer, reco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Boy howdy." He sips his beer, recovering. "Well. We'll get her help. You just stay out of the way. Way far out of the way."

fields.Title: You: ""Where'd she get all her cop gear?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where'd she get all her cop gear?"

fields.Title: Eugene: ""No, they totally said what it was...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, they totally said what it was... What was it..." He's still thinking it over in the corner. "Anyone remember?"

fields.Title: Alain: "The tattooed man scratches his head..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The tattooed man scratches his head with his knuckles. "I don't remember, I was fuckin' drunk."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "He takes off his cap and scratches..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He takes off his cap and scratches his head. "Auntie LePlante, we always called her. Something LePlante?"

fields.Title: Alain: ""Respectable professions don't shoo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Respectable professions don't shoot kids, *cerdo*!" He stands, hands wrapped tight around the back of his chair. "They don't beat confessions out of prisoners!"

fields.Title: Authority: "You absolute fool."
fields.Dialogue Text: You absolute fool.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Ah, don't worry about it, Al." The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, don't worry about it, Al." The big man smiles, pushing up his cap. "The cops wanna dress up and play policeman. Let 'em. We'll keep doing the real work."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Sure did, boss!" The rat-man's fac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure did, boss!" The rat-man's face is twisted with a smile. "Heard him loud and clear -- the pig's lost his gun to The Pigs!"

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Alain: ""Marianne, *amigo*," he says pourin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Marianne, *amigo*," he says pouring himself another drink.

fields.Title: You: ""Marianne Amigo LePlante.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Marianne Amigo LePlante."

fields.Title: You: ""Who was she?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who was she?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, yeah. We'll send someone out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, yeah. We'll send someone out. Who is -- wait... It's *The Pigs*, isn't it?"

fields.Title: You: ""She had my gun.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "She had my gun."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub]
Titus Hardie: "He pushes up his cap. "God, poor la..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He pushes up his cap. "God, poor lady. Don't worry. We'll handle this. I think she's got some family in Couron or something... Bastards left her alone when she got sick, we've been getting complaints."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, cop, that's some pretty fuck..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, cop, that's some pretty fucking weird shit to say. *The Pigs* level weird." The big man shrugs. "But whatever gets you through the day."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "The big man stares at you, still st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The big man stares at you, still stunned. Too stunned to even drink his beer. "Well," he says after a moment. "At least I can see you got it back. If you have any questions..." He waves in circles, still searching for words.

Variable["whirling.hardies_pigs_authority"]
!(Variable["whirling.hardies_pigs_authority"])
You: ""How did she get like this?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did she get like this?"

You: ""If you wanna be the local law enfo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you wanna be the local law enforcement, these kind of things fall on your shoulders."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "The big guy nods, drinking his toas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The big guy nods, drinking his toast. "Anything else you wanted to know?"

IsKimHere()

Rhetoric: "Us kids? That must have been ages a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Us kids? That must have been ages ago. She was better then.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You're fucking with me." The big m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're fucking with me." The big man slams his beer onto the table. "Your gun! She had your fucking gun!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Let me know if you figure it out b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let me know if you figure it out back there," the big man says, turning to you. "Now, anything else we can help you with?"

Authority: "Whatever you do, do not admit to th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever you do, do not admit to these punks you lost your gun. You will suffer if you do.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Police paraphernalia doesn't just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Police paraphernalia doesn't just wash up on the coast, people. It's not like we dump it at night. She bought it, collected it."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy, Al..." He glances over his s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, Al..." He glances over his shoulder. "We all hate him. The man's all cock and no balls. Can't trust a fella like that."

fields.Title: You: ""Nope! She didn't have anything of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nope! She didn't have anything of mine."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Easy, Al." The man says soothingly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, Al." The man says soothingly. "Don't let him get to you. Have one for Auntie LePlante, huh?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy there, Al." He turns to the t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy there, Al." He turns to the tattooed man, who is taking heaving breaths. "Sit down. We've got one of our own to take care of. So let's not get worked up."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Eugene: ""Hey," Eugene interjects. "Wasn't E..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey," Eugene interjects. "Wasn't Evrart's B Team looking for her the other day? They said something about her... I dunno, finding something?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Get wanting to be a cop, you mean?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Get wanting to be a cop, you mean? Well, she..." He furrows his brow in thought. "Shit, I don't actually know. Anyone know why she started acting like a pig?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "The big man stares at you, still st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The big man stares at you, still stunned. Too stunned to even drink his beer. "Where is it now," he asks slowly. "I don't see it..."

fields.Title: You: ""Thanks for helping out with this o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks for helping out with this one, Titus." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No problemo, cop-man. We take care..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No problemo, cop-man. We take care of our mentally ill here in Martinaise. Ain't that right, boys?"

fields.Title: You: ""Someone whose only connection to t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Someone whose only connection to the outside world is Channel 8 and it's cop programs?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Must be a local saying."
fields.Dialogue Text: Must be a local saying.

fields.Title: Alain: "The tattooed Mesque sinks into his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The tattooed Mesque sinks into his seat, unsure how to respond. "Yeah... you should be."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub]
Titus Hardie: ""At least it's in good hands." He s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least it's in good hands." He sips his beer, recovering. "Well. We'll get her help. You just stay out of the way. Way far out of the way."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Dunno," Titus says, shrugging. "Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Dunno," Titus says, shrugging. "She lives by the water. Shit washes up all the time on the beach."

fields.Title: Empathy: "The children kept her together."
fields.Dialogue Text: The children kept her together.

fields.Title: You: ""There's an old catatonic lady in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's an old catatonic lady in the old fish market, on the other side of the bay. She needs help."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Sure enough!" Eugene raises his gl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure enough!" Eugene raises his glass in toast. "We're the *real* heroes on these streets!"

fields.Title: Alain: ""Oh, don't even get me started on t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, don't even get me started on that Gareth Morrand crap!" The Mesque gets visibly agitated. "That racist fucking fuck... motherfucker."

fields.Title: Alain: ""Fuck you, pig!" He stands. "What t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck you, pig!" He stands. "What the fuck you playing at, huh?"

fields.Title: You: ""I didn't want it. Kim has it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I didn't want it. Kim has it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's been taken care of," the lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's been taken care of," the lieutenant replies laconically. "But she hasn't been."

fields.Title: You: ""Marianne LePlante.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Marianne LePlante."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No? Well, whatever then, copper."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No? Well, whatever then, copper." Titus chugs his beer down and wipes his mouth.

fields.Title: Alain: ""No fuckin' clue," the tattooed man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No fuckin' clue," the tattooed man shouts. "It's gotta be the crazy. Who'd *want* to be a pig?"

fields.Title: You: ""Someone who wanted to set the worl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Someone who wanted to set the world right before it ends. Ever think of that?"

fields.Title: You: ""I can't but feel partially respons..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't but feel partially responsible for the unhealthy culture that poor woman latched onto. I'm sorry."

fields.Title: You: ""More like who *wouldn't*! Cool uni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "More like who *wouldn't*! Cool uniforms, fast machines, packing heat? Sign me up!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Probably for the best. At least it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Probably for the best. At least it's not going to do harm there..." He sips his beer, recovering. "Well. We'll get her help. You just stay out of the way. Way far out of the way."

fields.Title: Alain: "He blinks. "No, I didn't. Because I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He blinks. "No, I didn't. Because I'm not fucking stupid, *polizonte*."

fields.Title: You: ""What's her name? Her real name.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's her name? Her real name."

fields.Title: Alain: ""You're already signed up, *cerdo*...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're already signed up, *cerdo*." The man shakes his head. "This guy's seriously damaged, T."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Don't disrespect Miss LePlante, co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't disrespect Miss LePlante, copper." The big man finishes off a can. "She's good people. We all get a little crazy sometimes."

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Esprit de Corps: "Station 41. A man carries a crate o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Station 41. A man carries a crate of rusted, unused badges. "You think these would net us something at the annual auction?" A balding detective drags a comb futilely across his head. "Shit, who'd want those? Just dump them into the river."
